definition: clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: Public celebration of the Eucharist in the Roman Catholic Church and some Protestant churches.
sentences.chinese: 十九世紀從羅馬天主教分離出來的天主教派。

sentences.english: But Jesus had no intention of founding a new sect or religion.
sentences.chinese: 但是耶穌並沒有建立一個新教派或新宗教的意圖。

sentences.english: The Quanzhen authentic rhyming is music used by Quanzhen School of Taoism.
sentences.chinese: 全真正韻是道教全真教派使用的音樂。

sentences.english: It is possible that at one time John was a member of the Judean Desert sect.
sentences.chinese: 有可能約翰曾經一度是那個小教派的成員。

sentences.english: "To expand my sect, I am willing to go even to the US to marry", he said.
sentences.chinese: “爲了發揚教派，我還想去美國娶妻”，他說。

sentences.english: Any other denominations in here say these things?
sentences.chinese: 還有哪些教派會說這些東西？

sentences.english: Simon, Marcel, Jewish Sects at the Time of Jesus, trans.
sentences.chinese: 西蒙，馬塞爾，教派猶太人在耶穌的時代，跨。

sentences.english: In the various sects of Tibetan Buddhism, the Gelug Sect is the latest to form one.
sentences.chinese: 在藏傳佛教的各個教派中，格魯派是最晚形成的一個。

sentences.english: Other denominational differences have to do with church government.
sentences.chinese: 各教派之間的其他差異與教會領導機構有關。

sentences.english: They thought the religious sect was guilty of brainwashing.
sentences.chinese: 他們認爲那個教派犯了洗腦的錯誤。

sentences.english: I understand that Cain is the last descendant of the ancient Horadrim and that his knowledge of their lore is vast.
sentences.chinese: 據我所知，凱恩是古代赫拉迪姆教派的最後傳人。

sentences.english: The protestant denomination adhering to the views of jacobus arminius.
sentences.chinese: 堅持雅各布斯阿米尼烏斯觀點的新教教派。

sentences.english: What do I mean by sectarianism?
Like the Pilgrims, they were also Calvinists.
sentences.chinese: 他們如同新教徒一樣是屬於加爾文教派。

sentences.english: They seem embarrassed to be linked with the Raelians.
sentences.chinese: 他們看來爲與拉耶爾教派牽連在一起而感到尷尬。

sentences.english: Similar in fact to the collectivist religions such as Islam.
sentences.chinese: 類似那些集權主義教派的伊斯蘭教。

definition: the Papacy/the Vatican/the Church government/Holy See
sun worship/Zoroastrianism/see also 祆教[Xian1 jiao4]
lit. true religion/orthodox religion/orthodox Christianity/Islam (in the writing of Chinese or Hui theologians)
